title: NASA study: clean, space-based solar power beaming is possible
summary: With commitment and investment, space-based solar power could become feasible and help reduce the world's carbon emissions.

title: Japan’s SLIM spacecraft reaches lunar surface in historic moon mission
summary: Japan staked a claim among national space powers on Friday, as its SLIM spacecraft reached the lunar surface.

title: China’s Landspace conducts first VTVL test for reusable stainless steel rocket
summary: Chinese launch startup Landspace executed a first vertical takeoff, vertical landing with a test article Friday at a launch and recovery site at Jiuquan spaceport.

title: Axiom Mission Carrying First ESA Project Astronaut Launched
summary:
The European Space Agency’s first project astronaut Marcus Wandt has launched aboard an Axiom-sponsored SpaceX Crew Dragon mission on his way to the International Space Station (ISS). Wandt and his three crew members were launched aboard the Crew Dragon Freedom atop a Falcon 9 rocket from the Kennedy Space Center late yesterday. After a successful […]

title: Axiom’s Third Private Astronaut Flight Up and Away
